data.message: why are some people only getting 6 photos? How can we correct?

replies.message: Hi Diane. Depending on how much content you've shared and how long you've been on Facebook, you will see a personalized movie, a collection of photos or a simple thank you card. -Ryan
That is Not Fair...there is people who is been in facebook since last year and they have a video and i only get 6 pictures

And your response to those who got six pics but have thousands of photos post everyday and the only photos we get are the pics from last month and a thank you. I post everyday. Multiple times...I must say its kind of an insult....
I had a movie but shared it on my wall then accidentally deleted it and now its just pictures. How can I recover the little movie I saw?
I have been on since 2008...I made a video, but no share button..clicked "home".. now it gives me 6 pic page. So thinking Ryan's comment does not apply. But know they are working on the matter. :)
I have been on a long time & share a lot of pics & stuff & got nothing !!!
I have been on along time, I don't get video just 6 pics
Yup, I have been on since 2009 and post tons and I got no video :'(
all i got in return was a Thank You, I wanna publish my video too.....
all i got was a thank you. i want my video published...
can I have a video please I have been on facebook since 2008 please I love seeing other peoples and would love to see one for me
I have been on facebook for years, just a collection of photos no video. My entire family has a video, why??
bunch of complainer's
i didnt get a video, only the most recent posted pictures, i want a video like the rest of my family and friends!
I also wanted a video but only got the 6 photos. smh

Yes, Paula ... did you get a video? I did not and would love to see my memories in the FB movie, the ones I have seen from families and friends are so special. its not the end of the world, geez worse things going on, but on the lighter side, it is frankly, "just a bummer!!!"
I do pray they fix it! I saw mine for a sec, now it's gone  :'(
How do I make my block of pictures into a video?

Facebook, do you think it's fair for 95%, or what it seems, of users to get a nice video, while the rest of us do not, . . .only a small collage of recent photos, or even a . . ."Thank you note?" Also, do you think it's being truthful when you imply, as well as all of news articles, including CNN, that everyone will be getting a look back video by saying "If you're on Facebook, a new video about your life went live online Tuesday?" I don't think so, since we few did not receive one. Not to mention how disappointing it is seeing all of your friends' videos, yet you did not get one. You all should have never done this in the first place if you could not provide it for everyone. But that's just my opinion. :/
How do I delete a picture on mine?
Can I ASk some Questions why ill press http.facebook.com/lookback\ not appear the video? Thanks!
I agree I can't access my video and want one really bad
my son died would love to have a video his picture is on my page as proof.
Six pictures no video.  Can you reset mine . Thanks.
i tried it so many times on different devices and still it wont give me the share button :/ really would like my video
